name: cross-platform-desktop-application-with-netcore2x-and-angular6x
description: Cross Platform Desktop Application with .Net Core 2 and Angular 6

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/icons/windows/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName='atillatan' --version-string.FileDescription='Cross Platform Desktop Application with .Net Core 2 and Angular 6' --version-string.ProductName='Cross Platform Desktop Application with .Net Core 2 and Angular 6'

author: atillatan
